publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3802 Lewis Macdonald: The Prohibition of Smoking in Certain Premises (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Health Committee recommends that the Prohibition of Smoking in Certain Premises (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*

S2M-3802 Lewis Macdonald: The Prohibition of Smoking in Certain Premises (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Health Committee recommends that the Prohibition of Smoking in Certain Premises (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr
